alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 07 at 2:59AM PDT until October 07 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are forecast to cool today and the heat advisory is being cancelled. Travel at area airports may be affected by dense fog. Travelers are urged to check the latest arrival and departure information.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles
